questions.question: How can you learn more about Blind Kahoot!'ing?

entities.resources:
Ready to truly transform your classroom? This kahoot is designed to help you learn how to use Kahoot! to introduce new subjects and use Kahoot! as an instructional tool. We call this "Blind Kahoot!'ing" - a term coined by IB Biology Teacher Stephanie Castle (scastle on Kahoot!). 
We've structured the kahoot to make it easy for you to just replace the actual questions, answers and media to make your very first #blindkahoot. There are many, many ways to create a #blindkahoot so you don't need to stick to this structure - just use it as a little guide to help get you started.
You'll find extra tips and guidance in the images - the best way to see larger (easier to read!) versions of those images is in Preview mode or by Editing the kahoot.
To learn more about Blind Kahoot!'ing:
WATCH: Kahoot! Masterclass video (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zbEThzLZozU)
DOWNLOAD: K! Academy PDF (http://bit.ly/KACADEMY)
READ: Kahoot! Journal (http://getkahoot.com/blog)
